name: Titanium.UI.Windows.AppBarToggleButton
summary: Toggle button for the Windows application bar.

deprecated.notes: As of Titanium 9.0.0, building Windows apps is no longer supported.

events.name: click
events.summary: Fired when the user presses the button.

properties.name: checked
properties.summary: Indicates if the button is checked or not.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: checked
properties.summary: Indicates if the button is toggled on or off.

properties.name: touchEnabled
properties.summary: Determines whether the view should receive touch events.
